text.text_translated: What does the art world think of **graffiti** and **street art**, which are types of art created in public places? Recently, people have started to understand its value as an art form, and there have been major exhibitions in galleries in Paris, London and Los Angeles. For example, the American artist Elura Emerald organised a street art exhibition in a New York gallery in 2008. She supported street artists. She said that artists who paint on the street are just expressing themselves and not hurting anyone. She also said that they should be appreciated and celebrated.
